entry.title: Friday: Snow. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Snow ending this afternoon then cloudy. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 9. Wind chill near minus 20. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clearing. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Clearing near midnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Light snow. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon then light snow. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 early in the afternoon. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 31 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 10 February 2023
